程序包 net.minecraftforge.client.model.animation

类 AnimationModelBase<T extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.model.ModelBase
      • net.minecraftforge.client.model.animation.AnimationModelBase<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IEventHandler<T>
    @Deprecated
public class AnimationModelBase<T extends Entity>
extends ModelBase
implements IEventHandler<T>
    已过时。
    ModelBase that works with the Forge model system and animations. Some quirks are still left, deprecated for the moment.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 net.minecraft.client.model.ModelBase
